channel.title: midrange on Erin's Audio Corner
channel.description: Recent content in midrange on Erin's Audio Corner

item.title: Peerless DX25TG59-04 1 Inch Tweeter Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review I purchased this tweeter through Parts Express. The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker.

item.title: Purifi Audio PTT6.5M-08-NFA-01A 6.5 Inch MidWoofer Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review This driver was loaned to me by Purifi for review. I was not paid for the review.

item.title: Purifi Audio PTT6.5X04-NAA-08 6.5 Inch Woofer Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review This driver was loaned to me by Purifi for review. I was not paid for the review.

item.title: Purifi Audio PTT8.0X04-NAB-02 8 Inch Woofer Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review This driver was loaned to me by Purifi for review. I was not paid for the review.

item.title: Purifi Audio PTT4.0W04-01A 4 Inch Midwoofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information The Purifi Audio PTT4.0W04 is a long linear throw 4-inch midwoofer which costs about $580/pair USD.

item.title: SB Acoustics SB17CAC35-4 6 Inch Ceramic Midwoofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per Madisound: SB Ceramic cones consist of an aluminum/ceramic dual layer cone.

item.title: ScanSpeak Illuminator 18WU4741T-00 7 Inch Midwoofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information The ScanSpeak Illuminator 7” Paper Cone Woofer 18WU/4741T-00 features the following:

item.title: AudioFrog GB60 6 Inch Midwoofer Review
item.description: Information Note: These speakers are designed specifically for car audio use and come with a kit of mounting gear such as adapter rings, grilles and additional installation hardware.

item.title: Dyn Audio MW182 10-Inch Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per the manual: The Esotec MW 182 is a 24 cm (10 inch) diameter woofer equipped with an extremely large, 100 mm (4 inch) diameter voice coil with a dual centered magnet system driving the MSP cone to ensure the greatest possible power handling.

item.title: Purifi Audio PTT6.5W04-01A 6.5 Inch Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per the manufacturer: The PTT6.5W04 is a 6.

item.title: Dyn Audio MW172 8-Inch Mid/Woofer Review
item.description: YouTube Video Review version: Information Per the manual: The new Esotec MW 172 is a 20 cm (8 inch) diameter mid/woofer designed for high performance two-and three way systems.

item.title: Audiofrog GB25 2.5 inch Midrange
item.description: Up for test is AudioFrog’s GB25 2.5 inch Midrange. Pictures don’t do justice to the smallness of these drivers but here they are anyway…

item.title: ScanSpeak Revelator 12M/4631-G00 4.5″ Midrange Driver Review
item.description: Up for test is the venerable Scan-Speak Revelator 12M/4631G-00 4.5″ Midrange. Some refer to this as one of (if not the) best pure midrange available.

item.title: Audiofrog GB40 4 inch Midrange
item.description: Up for test is AudioFrog’s GB40 4″ Midrange. These drivers – as well as the others from the AudioFrog GB series speakers – include a LOT of installation hardware to make installs quicker and easier.

item.title: Scanspeak 10F/4424G00 Discovery 4 inch Midrange (4 ohm version)
item.description: Up for test is the Scanspeak Discovery 10F/4424G 4 inch, 4 ohm midrange. This driver features a neo magnet to keep its weight down.

item.title: JL Audio C5-400cm 4-inch Midrange Review
item.description: Up for test is a JL Audio C5-400cm midrange. I was interested in this driver as it seems to be of reasonable cost given the small form factor and mounting options in addition to the fact that it uses a Kurt Müller cone design, which is a well regarded cone manufacturer.
